articles.title: Australia records one of its youngest COVID-19 deaths amid Sydney outbreak - CNA
articles.description: Australia's Queensland state reported 16 locally acquired COVID-19 cases on Wednesday as authorities warned a lockdown in state capital Brisbane might be extended beyond Sunday if people flout the tough restrictions.
articles.content:
SYDNEY: An Australian man in his 20s died at home of COVID-19 in Sydney, authorities said on Wednesday (Aug 4), one of the country's youngest coronavirus deaths.
